title: TryForce CUP #59 on 14.06.2015
body:
TFG  is proud to announce the next Tournament
We invite you to participate for a chance to win some fantastic prizes or giveaways.

The tournament begins at 14:00 on 31/05/2015.

Teams have time to register until 13:30 on the day of the tournament.

Check-in Times are from 12:30 - 13:40.

Depending on the number of Teams participating ; the duration of the tournament may vary. We expect the tournament to finish between 21:00 - 22:00.


To register, each team member must register on http://tryforce.eu.
Then your team captain creates a team http://tryforce.eu/index.php?teamcup
With this team you can now register at http://tryforce.eu/?cups-c84-details#sponsor for the tournament.

Registration Guide German = http://tryforce.eu/index.php?guides-s15
Registration Guide English = http://tryforce.eu/index.php?guides-s8

German rules = http://tryforce.eu/?guides-s10
English Rules = http://tryforce.eu/?guides-s11

Contact details:
General tournament questions, please contact our support at  support@tryforce.eu
If you want to donate to our prize pool for thetournament or give-aways, Please send us an mail to admin@tryforce.eu

Stream: http://www.twitch.tv/tryforceclan
